DataAdapter.Sql: SELECT CWR_ID, CWR_TK, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_EXCO_ID, CWR_DEPT_ID, CWR_CRA_ID, CWR_ECOD_ID, CWR_SUBE_ID, CWR_OVEREIGHTEEN_YN, CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, CWR_DATECREATED, CWR_VALIDFROM, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_ORDERNO, CWR_SECPASS_YN, CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD, CWR_ENTRYCOODID, CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD, CWR_CHKOFFCOODID, CWR_ORDERCOMPLET_YN, CWR_CHANGEUSER, CWR_TIMESTAMP, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_ACCESS, CWR_STATUS, CWR_MND_ID FROM FPASS_COWORKER WHERE (CWR_ID = :CWR_ID)

SELECT RATH_ID, RATH_CWR_ID, RATH_RATT_ID, RATH_USER_ID, RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN, RATH_RECEPTAUTHODATE, RATH_TIMESTAMP FROM FPASS_RECEPTIONAUTHORIZE WHERE (RATH_RATT_ID = :RATH_RATT_ID) AND (RATH_CWR_ID = :RATH_CWR_ID)

SELECT EXCO_ID, EXCO_MND_ID, EXCO_NAME, EXCO_DEBITNO, EXCO_CITY, EXCO_POSTCODE, EXCO_COUNTRY, EXCO_STREET, EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME, EXCO_SUPERSURNAME, EXCO_TELEPHONENO, EXCO_FAX, EXCO_MOBILEPHONE, EXCO_STATUS, EXCO_CHANGEUSER, EXCO_TIMESTAMP FROM FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR WHERE (EXCO_MND_ID = :EXCO_MND_ID) AND (EXCO_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR EXCO_STATUS IS NULL)
SELECT ECEC_CHANGEUSER, ECEC_TIMESTAMP, ECEC_ECOD_ID, ECEC_EXCO_ID FROM FPASS_EXCOECOD
SELECT DISTINCT EXCO_ID, EXCO_NAME, EXCO_CITY, VWC_ID, VWC_SURNAME, VWC_FIRSTNAME FROM vw_fpass_exco_coord_admin WHERE (EXCO_MND_ID = :EXCO_MND_ID) AND (EXCO_ID = :EXCO_ID) OR (VWC_ID = :VWC_ID)

SELECT PMTY_CHANGEUSER, PMTY_TIMESTAMP, PMTY_ID, PMTY_MND_ID, PMTY_TYPE, PMTY_NOTATION, PMTY_HELPFILE FROM FPASS_PRECMEDTYPE WHERE (PMTY_MND_ID = :PMTY_MND_ID) AND (PMTY_TYPE LIKE :PMTY_TYPE) AND (PMTY_NOTATION LIKE :PMTY_NOTATION) ORDER BY NLSSORT(PMTY_TYPE, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')

SELECT PL_CHANGEUSER, PL_TIMESTAMP, PL_ID, PL_MND_ID, PL_NAME, PL_STATUS, PL_SOURCE FROM FPASS_PLANT WHERE (PL_MND_ID = :PL_MND_ID) AND (PL_NAME LIKE :PL_NAME) AND (PL_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR PL_STATUS IS NULL) ORDER BY NLSSORT(PL_NAME, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT DEPT_CHANGEUSER, DEPT_TIMESTAMP, DEPT_ID, DEPT_MND_ID, DEPT_DEPARTMENT, DEPT_STATUS FROM FPASS_DEPARTMENT WHERE (DEPT_MND_ID = :DEPT_MND_ID) AND (DEPT_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR DEPT_STATUS IS NULL)
SELECT CRA_CHANGEUSER, CRA_TIMESTAMP, CRA_ID, CRA_MND_ID, CRA_CRAFTNO, CRA_CRAFTNOTATION FROM FPASS_CRAFT WHERE (CRA_MND_ID = :CRA_MND_ID)
SELECT UM_USER_ID, FPASS_USER_ID, BOTHNAMESTEL, UM_USERAPPLID FROM VW_FPASS_USERBYROLE WHERE (MND_ID = :MND_ID) AND (RO_ID = :RO_ID)
SELECT RL_ROLEID, RL_AUTHORIZEDENTITYID, RL_CHANGEUSER, RL_TIMESTAMP FROM UM_ROLELINK

SqlCommand.Sql: SELECT PARF_ID, PARF_KEY, PARF_VALUE FROM FPASS_PARAMETERFPASS WHERE PARF_MND_ID = :PARF_MND_ID
SELECT RL_ROLEID FROM VW_FPASS_ROLEBYMANDATOR WHERE (UM_ROLE_NAME = :UM_ROLE_NAME AND MND_ID = :MND_ID)
SELECT * FROM FPASS_CWRPIC WHERE CWPI_CWR_ID = :CWR_ID

SELECT CWR_TK, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_EXCO_ID, CWR_DEPT_ID, CWR_CRA_ID, CWR_ECOD_ID, CWR_SUBE_ID, CWR_OVEREIGHTEEN_YN, CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_MIFARENO, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, CWR_DATECREATED, CWR_WINDOWS_ID, CWR_SMARTACTNO, CWR_PKI, CWR_PHONE, CWR_IMPORTDATE, to_char(CWR_VALIDFROM, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as CWR_VALIDFROM, to_char(CWR_VALIDUNTIL, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_ORDERNO, CWR_SECPASS_YN, CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD, CWR_ENTRYCOODID, CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD, CWR_CHKOFFCOODID, CWR_ORDERCOMPLET_YN, CWR_CHANGEUSER, CWR_TIMESTAMP, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_ACCESS, CWR_STATUS, EXCO_SUPERSURNAME || ', ' || EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME as SUPERVISOR, EXCO_TELEPHONENO, CWR_PRECAUTIONMED_YN FROM FPASS_COWORKER, FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR WHERE CWR_ID = :CWR_ID AND CWR_EXCO_ID = EXCO_ID
SELECT CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_ACCESS FROM FPASS_COWORKER WHERE CWR_ID = :CWR_ID

SELECT CWR_TK, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_EXCO_ID, CWR_DEPT_ID, CWR_CRA_ID, CWR_ECOD_ID, CWR_SUBE_ID, CWR_OVEREIGHTEEN_YN, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, CWR_DATECREATED, CWR_VALIDFROM, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_ORDERNO, CWR_SECPASS_YN, CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD, CWR_ENTRYCOODID, CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD, CWR_CHKOFFCOODID, CWR_ORDERCOMPLET_YN, CWR_CHANGEUSER, CWR_TIMESTAMP, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_ACCESS, CWR_STATUS, EXCO_SUPERSURNAME || ', ' || EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME as SUPERVISOR, EXCO_TELEPHONENO, CWR_PRECAUTIONMED_YN, CWR_SMARTACTNO, CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_MIFARENO, CWR_PKI, CWR_PHONE, CWR_WINDOWS_ID, CWR_IMPORTDATE FROM VW_FPASS_ARCOWORKER, FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR WHERE CWR_ID = :CWR_ID AND CWR_EXCO_ID = EXCO_ID UNION SELECT CWR_TK, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_EXCO_ID, CWR_DEPT_ID, CWR_CRA_ID, CWR_ECOD_ID, CWR_SUBE_ID, CWR_OVEREIGHTEEN_YN, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, CWR_DATECREATED, CWR_VALIDFROM, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_ORDERNO, CWR_SECPASS_YN, CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD, CWR_ENTRYCOODID, CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD, CWR_CHKOFFCOODID, CWR_ORDERCOMPLET_YN, CWR_CHANGEUSER, CWR_TIMESTAMP, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_ACCESS, CWR_STATUS, EXCO_SUPERSURNAME || ', ' || EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME as SUPERVISOR, EXCO_TELEPHONENO, CWR_PRECAUTIONMED_YN, CWR_SMARTACTNO, CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_MIFARENO, CWR_PKI, CWR_PHONE, CWR_WINDOWS_ID, CWR_IMPORTDATE FROM VW_FPASS_ARCOWORKER, VW_FPASS_AREXCONTRACTOR WHERE CWR_ID = :CWR_ID AND CWR_EXCO_ID = EXCO_ID

INSERT INTO FPASS_COWORKER ( CWR_ID, CWR_TK, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_EXCO_ID, CWR_DEPT_ID, CWR_CRA_ID, CWR_ECOD_ID, CWR_SUBE_ID, CWR_OVEREIGHTEEN_YN, CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_MIFARENO, CWR_WINDOWS_ID, CWR_SMARTACTNO, CWR_PKI, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, CWR_DATECREATED, CWR_VALIDFROM, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_ORDERNO, CWR_SECPASS_YN, CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD, CWR_ENTRYCOODID, CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD, CWR_CHKOFFCOODID, CWR_ORDERCOMPLET_YN, CWR_CHANGEUSER, CWR_TIMESTAMP, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_MND_ID, CWR_PRECAUTIONMED_YN, CWR_PHONE ) VALUES ( :CWR_ID, :CWR_TK, :CWR_PERSNO, :CWR_EXCO_ID, :CWR_DEPT_ID, :CWR_CRA_ID, :CWR_ECOD_ID, :CWR_SUBE_ID, :CWR_OVEREIGHTEEN_YN, :CWR_IDCARDNO, :CWR_MIFARENO, :CWR_WINDOWS_ID, :CWR_SMARTACTNO, :CWR_PKI, :CWR_SURNAME, :CWR_FIRSTNAME, :CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, :CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, :CWR_DATECREATED, :CWR_VALIDFROM, :CWR_VALIDUNTIL, :CWR_ORDERNO, :CWR_SECPASS_YN, :CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD, :CWR_ENTRYCOODID, :CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD, :CWR_CHKOFFCOODID, :CWR_ORDERCOMPLET_YN, :CWR_CHANGEUSER, :CWR_TIMESTAMP, :CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, :CWR_MND_ID, :CWR_PRECAUTIONMED_YN, :CWR_PHONE )

UPDATE FPASS_COWORKER SET CWR_TK = :CWR_TK, CWR_PERSNO = :CWR_PERSNO, CWR_EXCO_ID = :CWR_EXCO_ID, CWR_DEPT_ID = :CWR_DEPT_ID, CWR_CRA_ID = :CWR_CRA_ID, CWR_ECOD_ID = :CWR_ECOD_ID, CWR_SUBE_ID = :CWR_SUBE_ID, CWR_OVEREIGHTEEN_YN = :CWR_OVEREIGHTEEN_YN, CWR_IDCARDNO = :CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_SURNAME = :CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME = :CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH = :CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH = :CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, CWR_DATECREATED = :CWR_DATECREATED, CWR_VALIDFROM = :CWR_VALIDFROM, CWR_ORDERNO = :CWR_ORDERNO, CWR_SECPASS_YN = :CWR_SECPASS_YN, CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD = :CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD, CWR_ENTRYCOODID = :CWR_ENTRYCOODID, CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD = :CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD, CWR_CHKOFFCOODID = :CWR_CHKOFFCOODID, CWR_ORDERCOMPLET_YN = :CWR_ORDERCOMPLET_YN, CWR_CHANGEUSER = :CWR_CHANGEUSER, CWR_TIMESTAMP = :CWR_TIMESTAMP, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS = :CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_MND_ID = :CWR_MND_ID, CWR_PRECAUTIONMED_YN = :CWR_PRECAUTIONMED_YN, CWR_PHONE = :CWR_PHONE, CWR_WINDOWS_ID = :CWR_WINDOWS_ID, CWR_SMARTACTNO = :CWR_SMARTACTNO, CWR_MIFARENO = :CWR_MIFARENO, CWR_PKI = :CWR_PKI WHERE (CWR_ID = :CWR_ID)

SELECT CWBR_ID, CWBR_USER_ID, CWBR_BRF_ID, CWBR_BRIEFING_YN , CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_TIMESTAMP, CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, USERNICENAME, CWBR_DIRECTBRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_DIRECTUSER_ID, DIRECTUSERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_EDITCWRBRIEFING WHERE (CWBR_CWR_ID = :CWBR_CWR_ID)

SELECT CWBR_ID, CWBR_USER_ID, CWBR_BRF_ID, CWBR_BRIEFING_YN , CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_TIMESTAMP, CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, USERNICENAME, CWBR_DIRECTBRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_DIRECTUSER_ID, DIRECTUSERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_AREDITCWRBRIEFING WHERE (CWBR_CWR_ID = :CWBR_CWR_ID)

UPDATE FPASS_CWRBRIEFING SET CWBR_USER_ID = :CWBR_USER_ID, CWBR_BRIEFING_YN = :CWBR_BRIEFING_YN, CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE = :CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_TIMESTAMP = :CWBR_TIMESTAMP, CWBR_INACTIVE_YN = :CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, CWBR_DIRECTUSER_ID = :CWBR_DIRECTUSER_ID, CWBR_DIRECTBRIEFINGDATE = :CWBR_DIRECTBRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_CWR_ID = :CWBR_CWR_ID, CWBR_BRF_ID = :CWBR_BRF_ID, CWBR_LASTUSER_ID = :CWBR_LASTUSER_ID WHERE (CWBR_ID = :CWBR_ID)

INSERT INTO fpass_cwrbriefing( CWBR_ID, CWBR_CWR_ID, CWBR_BRF_ID, CWBR_USER_ID, CWBR_BRIEFING_YN, CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, CWBR_DIRECTUSER_ID, CWBR_DIRECTBRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_LASTUSER_ID, CWBR_TIMESTAMP ) VALUES( :CWBR_ID, :CWBR_CWR_ID, :CWBR_BRF_ID, :CWBR_USER_ID, :CWBR_BRIEFING_YN, :CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE, :CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, :CWBR_DIRECTUSER_ID, :CWBR_DIRECTBRIEFINGDATE, :CWBR_LASTUSER_ID, :CWBR_TIMESTAMP )

SELECT PMED_ID, PMED_USER_ID, PMED_EXECUTEDON, PMED_TIMESTAMP, PMED_INACTIVE_YN, PMED_VALIDUNTIL, PMED_PMTY_ID, PMTY_NOTATION, PMTY_TYPE, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_EDITCWRPRECMED WHERE (PMED_CWR_ID = :PMED_CWR_ID)

SELECT PMED_ID, PMED_USER_ID, PMED_EXECUTEDON, PMED_TIMESTAMP, PMED_INACTIVE_YN, PMED_VALIDUNTIL, PMED_PMTY_ID, PMTY_NOTATION, PMTY_TYPE, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_AREDITCWRPRECMED WHERE (PMED_CWR_ID = :PMED_CWR_ID)

INSERT INTO fpass_precautionmed (PMED_ID, PMED_CWR_ID, PMED_PMTY_ID, PMED_USER_ID, PMED_EXECUTEDON, PMED_INACTIVE_YN, PMED_TIMESTAMP, PMED_VALIDUNTIL ) values ( :PMED_ID, :PMED_CWR_ID, :PMED_PMTY_ID, :PMED_USER_ID, :PMED_EXECUTEDON, :PMED_INACTIVE_YN, :PMED_TIMESTAMP, :PMED_VALIDUNTIL )

UPDATE FPASS_PRECAUTIONMED SET PMED_CWR_ID = :PMED_CWR_ID, PMED_USER_ID = :PMED_USER_ID, PMED_EXECUTEDON = :PMED_EXECUTEDON, PMED_PMTY_ID = :PMED_PMTY_ID, PMED_VALIDUNTIL = :PMED_VALIDUNTIL, PMED_TIMESTAMP = :PMED_TIMESTAMP, PMED_INACTIVE_YN = :PMED_INACTIVE_YN WHERE ( PMED_ID = :PMED_ID)
DELETE FPASS_PRECAUTIONMED WHERE (PMED_CWR_ID = :PMED_CWR_ID AND PMED_PMTY_ID = :PMED_PMTY_ID)

INSERT INTO FPASS_CWRBRIEFING (CWBR_ID, CWBR_CWR_ID, CWBR_BRF_ID, CWBR_USER_ID, CWBR_BRIEFING_YN, CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, CWBR_LASTUSER_ID, CWBR_TIMESTAMP ) VALUES ( :CWBR_ID, :CWBR_CWR_ID, :CWBR_BRF_ID, :CWBR_USER_ID, :CWBR_BRIEFING_YN, :CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE, :CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, :CWBR_LASTUSER_ID, SYSDATE )

UPDATE FPASS_CWRBRIEFING SET CWBR_BRIEFING_YN = :CWBR_BRIEFING_YN, CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE = :CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE, CWBR_INACTIVE_YN = :CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, CWBR_USER_ID = :CWBR_USER_ID, CWBR_TIMESTAMP = SYSDATE WHERE ( CWBR_CWR_ID = :CWBR_CWR_ID AND CWBR_BRF_ID = :CWBR_BRF_ID)

UPDATE FPASS_CWRBRIEFING SET CWBR_INACTIVE_YN = :CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, CWBR_USER_ID = :CWBR_USER_ID, CWBR_TIMESTAMP = SYSDATE, CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE = SYSDATE WHERE ( CWBR_CWR_ID = :CWBR_CWR_ID AND CWBR_BRF_ID = :CWBR_BRF_ID)

UPDATE FPASS_CWRBRIEFING SET CWBR_INACTIVE_YN = :CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, CWBR_USER_ID = :CWBR_USER_ID, CWBR_TIMESTAMP = SYSDATE, CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE = SYSDATE WHERE CWBR_CWR_ID = :CWBR_CWR_ID AND CWBR_BRF_ID IN (:CWBR_BRF_ID, :CWBR_BRFL_ID)

SELECT CWPL_ID, CWPL_PL_ID, CWPL_CWR_ID, CWPL_USER_ID, CWPL_PLANTDATE, CWPL_PLANT_YN, CWPL_INACTIVE_YN, CWPL_VALIDUNTIL, PL_NAME, PL_SOURCE, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_EDITCWRPLANT WHERE (CWPL_CWR_ID = :CWPL_CWR_ID)

SELECT CWPL_ID, CWPL_PL_ID, CWPL_CWR_ID, CWPL_USER_ID, CWPL_PLANTDATE, CWPL_PLANT_YN, CWPL_INACTIVE_YN, CWPL_VALIDUNTIL, PL_NAME, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_AREDITCWRPLANT WHERE (CWPL_CWR_ID = :CWPL_CWR_ID)

SELECT DISTINCT USPL.USPL_PL_ID, USPL.USPL_USER_ID FROM FPASS_USERPLANT USPL, FPASS_PLANT PL WHERE USPL.USPL_PL_ID = PL.PL_ID AND PL.PL_MND_ID = :PL_MND_ID AND (PL.PL_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR PL.PL_STATUS IS NULL)

INSERT INTO FPASS_CWRPLANT (CWPL_ID, CWPL_PL_ID, CWPL_CWR_ID, CWPL_USER_ID, CWPL_PLANTDATE, CWPL_VALIDUNTIL, CWPL_TIMESTAMP, CWPL_PLANT_YN, CWPL_INACTIVE_YN) VALUES (:CWPL_ID, :CWPL_PL_ID, :CWPL_CWR_ID, :CWPL_USER_ID, :CWPL_PLANTDATE, :CWPL_VALIDUNTIL, :CWPL_TIMESTAMP, :CWPL_PLANT_YN, :CWPL_INACTIVE_YN)

UPDATE FPASS_CWRPLANT SET CWPL_PL_ID = :CWPL_PL_ID, CWPL_CWR_ID = :CWPL_CWR_ID, CWPL_USER_ID = :CWPL_USER_ID, CWPL_PLANTDATE = :CWPL_PLANTDATE, CWPL_VALIDUNTIL = :CWPL_VALIDUNTIL, CWPL_TIMESTAMP = :CWPL_TIMESTAMP, CWPL_PLANT_YN = :CWPL_PLANT_YN, CWPL_INACTIVE_YN = :CWPL_INACTIVE_YN WHERE CWPL_ID = :CWPL_ID
DELETE FPASS_CWRPLANT WHERE CWPL_ID = :CWPL_ID

SELECT RATH_ID, RATH_RATT_ID, RATH_CWR_ID, RATH_USER_ID, RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN, RATH_COMMENT, RATH_RECEPTAUTHODATE, RATH_TIMESTAMP, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_EDITCWRRECAUTH WHERE (RATH_CWR_ID = :RATH_CWR_ID)

SELECT RATH_ID, RATH_RATT_ID, RATH_CWR_ID, RATH_RATT_ID, RATH_USER_ID, RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN, RATH_COMMENT, RATH_RECEPTAUTHODATE, RATH_TIMESTAMP, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_AREDITCWRRECAUTH WHERE (RATH_CWR_ID = :RATH_CWR_ID)

UPDATE fpass_receptionauthorize SET RATH_USER_ID = :RATH_USER_ID, RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN = :RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN, RATH_COMMENT = :RATH_COMMENT, RATH_RECEPTAUTHODATE = :RATH_RECEPTAUTHODATE, RATH_TIMESTAMP = :RATH_TIMESTAMP, RATH_RATT_ID = :RATH_RATT_ID WHERE ( RATH_ID = :RATH_ID)

INSERT INTO fpass_receptionauthorize (RATH_ID, RATH_CWR_ID, RATH_RATT_ID, RATH_USER_ID, RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN, RATH_COMMENT, RATH_RECEPTAUTHODATE, RATH_TIMESTAMP ) VALUES ( :RATH_ID, :RATH_CWR_ID, :RATH_RATT_ID, :RATH_USER_ID, :RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN, :RATH_COMMENT, :RATH_RECEPTAUTHODATE, :RATH_TIMESTAMP )

SELECT REMA_ID, REMA_CWR_ID, REMA_RMTY_ID, RMTY_SYSTEM, REMA_USER_ID, REMA_MASKNO, REMA_DATE, REMA_NEXT_MAINTAIN, REMA_TIMESTAMP, US_USERID, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_EDITCWRRESPMASK WHERE (REMA_CWR_ID = :REMA_CWR_ID) AND REMA_RMTY_ID IN ( :REMA_RMTY_LENT_ID, :REMA_RMTY_RETURN_ID)

SELECT REMA_ID, REMA_CWR_ID, REMA_RMTY_ID, RMTY_SYSTEM, REMA_USER_ID, REMA_MASKNO, REMA_DATE, REMA_TIMESTAMP, US_USERID, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_EDITCWRRESPMASKLENT WHERE (REMA_CWR_ID = :REMA_CWR_ID)
SELECT REMA_ID, REMA_CWR_ID, REMA_RMTY_ID, REMA_USER_ID, REMA_MASKNO, REMA_DATE, REMA_TIMESTAMP, US_USERID, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_AREDITCWRRESPMASKLENT WHERE (REMA_CWR_ID = :REMA_CWR_ID)
SELECT MIN(gti.NDATUM) AS NDATUM FROM syscom_GERAETESTAMM gsta, syscom_GERAETESTAMM_INTERVALLE gti WHERE gsta.ID = gti.IDPARENT AND (gsta.BARCODE = :GER_BARCODE)

SELECT REMA_ID, REMA_CWR_ID, REMA_RMTY_ID, REMA_USER_ID, REMA_INACTIVE_YN, REMA_MASKNO, REMA_DATE, REMA_NEXT_MAINTAIN, REMA_TIMESTAMP, US_USERID, USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_AREDITCWRRESPMASK WHERE (REMA_CWR_ID = :REMA_CWR_ID)
SELECT COWORKER, REMA_DATE_LENT, REMA_DATE_RET FROM VW_FPASS_RESPMASK_LENT WHERE (REMA_MASKNO = :REMA_MASKNO)

SELECT GER_BARCODE, AUSGEMUSTERT, GESPERRTDATUM, GESPERRTGRUND, FUNKTIONSTUECHTIG, STANDORT1, COWORKER, GER_LAST_MAINTAIN, GER_NEXT_MAINTAIN, REMA_RMTYID_LENT, REMA_DATE_LENT, REMA_RMTYID_RET, REMA_DATE_RET FROM VW_FPASS_RESPMASK_AVAIL WHERE (GER_BARCODE = :GER_BARCODE)
SELECT MAX(REMA_DATE) AS MAXMASKDATE FROM FPASS_RESPMASK WHERE REMA_CWR_ID = :REMA_CWR_ID
SELECT FLO_BARCODE, FLO_MAINTAIN_DUE FROM VW_FLORIX_MASK WHERE (FLO_BARCODE = :FLO_BARCODE)

INSERT INTO FPASS_RESPMASK (REMA_ID, REMA_CWR_ID, REMA_RMTY_ID, REMA_MASKNO, REMA_DATE, REMA_USER_ID, REMA_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (:REMA_ID, :REMA_CWR_ID, :REMA_RMTY_ID, :REMA_MASKNO, :REMA_DATE, :REMA_LAST_MAINTAIN, :REMA_USER_ID, :REMA_TIMESTAMP)
SP_INSERT_FPASS_RESPMASK(:REMA_CWR_ID, :REMA_RMTY_ID, :REMA_MASKNO, :REMA_DATE, :REMA_USER_ID)
UPDATE FPASS_RESPMASK SET REMA_USER_ID = :REMA_USER_ID, REMA_MASKNO = :REMA_MASKNO, REMA_DATE = :REMA_DATE, REMA_TIMESTAMP = :REMA_TIMESTAMP WHERE ( REMA_ID = :REMA_ID)
SELECT VRNO_ID, VRNO_CWR_ID, VRNO_VEHREGNO, VRNO_CHANGEUSER, VRNO_TIMESTAMP FROM FPASS_VEHREGNO WHERE (VRNO_CWR_ID = :VRNO_CWR_ID)
SELECT VRNO_ID, VRNO_CWR_ID, VRNO_VEHREGNO, VRNO_CHANGEUSER, VRNO_TIMESTAMP FROM VW_FPASS_ARVEHREGNO WHERE (VRNO_CWR_ID = :VRNO_CWR_ID)
UPDATE fpass_vehregno SET VRNO_CHANGEUSER = :VRNO_CHANGEUSER, VRNO_VEHREGNO = :VRNO_VEHREGNO, VRNO_TIMESTAMP = :VRNO_TIMESTAMP WHERE ( VRNO_ID = :VRNO_ID)
INSERT INTO fpass_vehregno (VRNO_ID, VRNO_CWR_ID, VRNO_VEHREGNO, VRNO_CHANGEUSER, VRNO_TIMESTAMP ) values (:VRNO_ID, :VRNO_CWR_ID, :VRNO_VEHREGNO, :VRNO_CHANGEUSER, :VRNO_TIMESTAMP )
UPDATE FPASS_COWORKER SET CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS = :CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_CHANGEUSER = :CWR_CHANGEUSER, CWR_TIMESTAMP = :CWR_TIMESTAMP WHERE CWR_ID = :CWR_ID

SELECT PMED_VALIDUNTIL, PMED_EXECUTEDON, PMTY_NOTATION, PMTY_TYPE, USER_NAME from fpass_precautionmed, fpass_precmedtype, fpass_user where PMED_CWR_ID = :PMED_CWR_ID and PMED_PMTY_ID = PMTY_ID and PMED_USER_ID = USER_ID
SELECT DYFP_ID, DYFP_DATE, DYFP_TIME, DYFP_ENTRY, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, EXCO_NAME FROM VW_FPASS_DYNAMIC

SELECT ACWR_ID, AVWS_SURNAME, AVWS_FIRSTNAME, AVWS_DATEOFBIRTH, AVWS_PLACEOFBIRTH, AVWS_STATUS, AVWS_VALIDUNTIL, AVWS_RETURNCODE_ZKS, AVWS_ACCESS, AVWS_EXCONAME, AVWS_SUPERNAME, AVWS_SUPERTEL, AVWS_COORD_ID, AVWS_COORD_SURNAME, AVWS_COORD_TEL, AVWS_SUBNAME FROM VW_FPASS_ARCOWORKER_SUMMARY

SELECT CWR_ID, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, CWR_OVEREIGHTEEN_YN, CWR_STATUS, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, EXTCON, SUPERNAME, SUPERTEL, SUBCON, VWC_SURNAME, VWC_TEL, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS FROM vw_fpass_coworker_summary

SELECT DISTINCT CWR_ID,CWR_STATUS,CWR_ACCESS,CWR_PERSNO,CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_SURNAME,CWR_FIRSTNAME,CWR_DATEOFBIRTH,CWR_VALIDUNTIL,CWR_DATECREATED,CWR_ORDERNO,CWR_MND_ID,EXTCON,SUPERVISOR,SUPERTEL,COORDINATOR,COORDSURNAME,COORDFIRSTNAME,VWC_TEL,SUBCON,RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN,CWR_VALIDFROM,CWR_IDCARDNO FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTCOWORKER

SELECT CWR_ID, CWR_STATUS, CWR_ACCESS, LASTBOOK, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_SURNAME,CWR_FIRSTNAME,CWR_DATEOFBIRTH,CWR_VALIDUNTIL,CWR_DATECREATED,CWR_ORDERNO,CWR_MND_ID,EXTCON,SUPERVISOR,SUPERTEL,COORDINATOR,COORDSURNAME,COORDFIRSTNAME,VWC_TEL,SUBCON,RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN,CWR_VALIDFROM,CWR_IDCARDNO FROM vw_fpass_reportcwr_nobook

SELECT VATT_CWR_ID,VATT_CWR_MND_ID,VATT_STATUS,VATT_ACCESS,VATT_PERSNUMBER,VATT_SURNAME,VATT_FIRSTNAME,VATT_COWORKER,VATT_DATEOFBIRTH,VATT_COORDINATORNAMETEL,VATT_EXCONTRACTOR,VATT_DEBITNO,VATT_SUBCONTRACTOR,VATT_RETURNCODEZKS,VATT_BOOKING,VATT_ENTRYDATE,VATT_EXITDATE,VATT_ATTENDANCETIME,VATT_ATTENDANCEHOURS,VATT_OVERLIMIT FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTCWRATTENDANCE

SELECT EXCO_ID, EXCO_MND_ID, EXCO_NAME, EXCO_DEBITNO, EXCO_SUPERVISOR, EXCO_TELEPHONENO, EXCO_STREET, EXCO_POSTCODE, EXCO_CITY, count(distinct CWR_PERSNO) as EXCO_COUNTPERS, round(sum(EXCO_HOURS)/(60*60), 2) as EXCO_SUMMEDHOURS FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTEXCOATTENDANCE
SELECT VATT_CWR_MND_ID, VATT_PERSNUMBER, VATT_SURNAME, VATT_FIRSTNAME, VATT_EXCONTRACTOR, VATT_SUBCONTRACTOR, VATT_BOOKINGDATE, VATT_BOOKING FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTCWRATTPERSNO

SELECT CWR_ID, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_DATECREATED, CWR_ORDERNO, CWR_MND_ID, EXTCON, SUPERVISOR, SUPERTEL, COORDINATOR, VWC_TEL, SUBCON, CRA_CRAFTNO, CRA_CRAFTNOTATION, COORDSURNAME, COORDFIRSTNAME, CWR_VALIDFROM, DEPT_DEPARTMENT, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, EXCO_STREET, EXCO_COUNTRY, EXCO_CITY, EXCO_POSTCODE, EXCO_FAX,EXCO_MOBILEPHONE, EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME, EXCO_SUPERSURNAME, CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD, CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD,CWR_SECPASS_YN,CWR_PRECAUTIONMED_YN,CWR_ORDERCOMPLET_YN,SECURITY_YN,SECURITYDATE,SECURITYUSER,ACCESS_YN,ACCESSDATE,ACCESSCOMMENT,ACCESSUSER,SIGNATUR_YN,SIGNATURDATE,SIGNATURUSER,ISBSITE_YN,ISBSITEDATE,ISBSITEUSER,SITESECURITYBR_YN,SITESECURITYBRDATE,SITESECURITYBRUSER,IDENTIFYCARD_YN,IDENTIFYCARDDATE,IDENTIFYCARDUSER,WEARBRIAPPARG26_2YN,WEARBRIAPPARDATEG26_2,WEARBRIAPPARUSERG26_2,WEARBRIAPPARG26_3YN,WEARBRIAPPARDATEG26_3,WEARBRIAPPARUSERG26_3,PALLETLIFTER_YN,PALLETLIFTERDATE,PALLETLIFTERUSER,RAISEABLEPLATF_YN,RAISEABLEPLATFDATE, RAISEABLEPLATFUSER,CRANELIFTGEAR_YN,CRANELIFTGEARDATE,CRANELIFTGEARUSER,DEPARTBRIEF_YN,DEPARTBRIEFDATE,DEPARTBRIEFUSER, RESPSITEFIRE_YN, RESPSITEFIREDATE, RESPSITEFIREUSER, MASKLENTDETAILS, MASKLENTDATE, MASKLENTUSER, MASKRETURNDETAILS, MASKRETURNDATE, MASKRETURNUSER, SHORTGATEWAYDESIRE_YN,SHORTGATEWAY_YN,SHORTGATEWAYDATE,SHORTGATEWAYUSER,LONGGATEWAYDESIRE_YN,LONGGATEWAY_YN,LONGGATEWAYDATE,LONGGATEWAYUSER, FIREBRIEFYN, FIREBRIEFDATE, FIREBRIEFUSER FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTALLDATA

SELECT CWR_ID, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_DATECREATED, CWR_ORDERNO, CWR_MND_ID, EXTCON, SUPERVISOR, SUPERTEL, COORDINATOR, VWC_TEL, SUBCON, CRA_CRAFTNO, COORDSURNAME, COORDFIRSTNAME, CWR_VALIDFROM, DEPT_DEPARTMENT, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME, EXCO_SUPERSURNAME, CWR_ENTRYDATECOOD, CWR_CHKOFFDATECOOD, ENTRYUSER, CHKUSER, CWR_SECPASS_YN, CWR_PRECAUTIONMED_YN, SECURITY_YN, SECURITYDATE, SECURITYUSER, ACCESS_YN, ACCESSDATE, ACCESSCOMMENT, ACCESSUSER, SIGNATUR_YN, SIGNATURDATE, SIGNATURUSER, ISBSITE_YN, ISBSITEDATE, ISBSITEUSER, SITESECURITYBR_YN, SITESECURITYBRDATE, SITESECURITYBRUSER, IDENTIFYCARD_YN, IDENTIFYCARDDATE, IDENTIFYCARDUSER, WEARBRIAPPARG26_2YN, WEARBRIAPPARDATEG26_2, WEARBRIAPPARUSERG26_2, WEARBRIAPPARG26_3YN, WEARBRIAPPARDATEG26_3, WEARBRIAPPARUSERG26_3, PALLETLIFTER_YN, PALLETLIFTERDATE, PALLETLIFTERUSER, RAISEABLEPLATF_YN, RAISEABLEPLATFDATE, RAISEABLEPLATFUSER, CRANELIFTGEAR_YN, CRANELIFTGEARDATE, CRANELIFTGEARUSER, DEPARTBRIEF_YN, DEPARTBRIEFDATE, DEPARTBRIEFUSER, RESPSITEFIRE_YN, RESPSITEFIREDATE, RESPSITEFIREUSER, FIREBRIEFYN, FIREBRIEFDATE, FIREBRIEFUSER FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTPASS
SELECT CWPL_ID, CWPL_CWR_ID, CWPL_PLANTDATE, CWPL_PLANT_YN, PLANTUSER, PL_NAME FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTCWRPLANT
SELECT PMED_ID,PMED_CWR_ID,PMED_VALIDUNTIL, PMTY_TYPE FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTPRECAUTIONMED
SELECT PMED_ID,PMED_CWR_ID,PMED_VALIDUNTIL,PMED_EXECUTEDON,PMTY_TYPE,PMTY_NOTATION,PMTY_MND_ID,USER_NAME FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTPRECMEDALLDATA

SELECT DISTINCT CWR_ID, REMA_MASKNO, MASKSYSTEM, MASKDATELENT, MASKDATERETURN, MASKSYSTEM, MASKNEXTMAINTAIN, CWR_STATUS, CWR_ACCESS, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, COWORKER, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_ORDERNO, CWR_MND_ID, CWR_EXCO_ID, EXTCON, SUPERVISOR, SUPERTEL, COORDINATOR, COORDSURNAME, COORDFIRSTNAME, VWC_TEL, SUBCON, RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTRESPMASK
SELECT MBC_CWR_ID, MBC_MASKNO, MBC_SYSTEM, MBC_DATE_LENT, MBC_USER_LENT, MBC_MASKNO_RET, MBC_DATE_RET, MBC_USER_RET FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTMASKBYCOWORKER
SELECT DYFP_ID,DYFP_DATE,DYFP_TIME,DYFP_ENTRY,DYFP_CWR_ID FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTDYNAMICDATA
SELECT DISTINCT CWR_ID, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_MND_ID, EXTCON, CWR_IDCARDNO FROM vw_fpass_reportdynmonths
SELECT DISTINCT CWR_ID, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTDYNMONTHSLIGHT
SELECT DISTINCT CWR_ID, CWR_EXCO_ID, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, EXTCON, CWR_IDCARDNO, COUNT( DISTINCT DYFP_DATE ) AS SUMDAYSONECWR FROM vw_fpass_reportdynmonths
SELECT CWR_ID,CWR_EXCO_ID,CWR_SURNAME,CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_PERSNO,SUMDAYSONECWR,EXCO_NAME FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTSUMCWR
SELECT DISTINCT EXCO_ID,EXCO_NAME,EXCO_DEBITNO,EXCO_CITY,EXCO_POSTCODE,EXCO_COUNTRY,EXCO_STREET,EXCO_TELEPHONENO,EXCO_SUPERVISOR FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTEXCONTRSUMCWR

SELECT DISTINCT CWR_ID,CWR_STATUS,CWR_ACCESS,CWR_PERSNO,CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS,CWR_SURNAME,CWR_FIRSTNAME,CWR_DATEOFBIRTH,CWR_VALIDUNTIL,CWR_DATECREATED,CWR_ORDERNO,CWR_MND_ID,EXTCON,SUPERVISOR,SUPERTEL,COORDINATOR,VWC_TEL,SUBCON,RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN, DEPT_DEPARTMENT,CRA_CRAFTNOTATION,COORDSURNAME,COORDFIRSTNAME,CWR_VALIDFROM FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTDELCOWORKER
SELECT USER_ID,USER_NAME,DEPT_DEPARTMENT FROM VW_FPASS_USERDEPARTMENT

SELECT DISTINCT CWR_ID, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, EXTCON, SUPERVISOR, SUPERTEL, COORDINATOR, VWC_TEL, SUBCON, CWR_STATUS, CWR_RETURNCODE_ZKS, CWR_ACCESS FROM VW_FPASS_EXTENDEDSEARCHCWR
SELECT CWR_ID FROM VW_FPASS_CWRBRIEFING
SELECT CWR_ID FROM VW_FPASS_RECEPTIONAUTHORIZE
SELECT CWR_ID FROM VW_FPASS_PLANTMASKMED
SELECT HIST_ID,CHANGEDATE,TABLENAME,COLUMNNAME,ROW_ID,OLDVALUE,NEWVALUE,HISTUSER,COWORKERID FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTHIST
SELECT CWPL_ID,CWPL_CWR_ID,PL_NAME,PL_MND_ID,US_FIRSTNAME,US_NAME,USER_TEL FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTCWRPLANTMANAGER
SELECT DISTINCT CWR_ID, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, EXTCON FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTCOWORKER

SELECT VH3_HIST_ID, VH3_CWR_ID, VH3_BOTHNAME, VH3_PERSNO, VH3_COLUMNNAME, VH3_COLUMNDESC, VH3_TABLEDESC, VH3_OLDVALUEDESC, VH3_NEWVALUEDESC, VH3_CHANGEDATE, VH3_CHANGEUSER FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTCOWORKER_HIST
SELECT CWR_ID, DYFP_DATE, DYFP_TIME, DYFP_ENTRY FROM VW_FPASS_REPORTBOOKINGS
SELECT DISTINCT ECEC_CHANGEUSER, ECEC_TIMESTAMP, ECEC_EXCO_ID, EXCO_NAME, EXCO_STATUS, ECEC_ECOD_ID, UM_BOTHNAMESTEL FROM vw_fpass_exco_coord_admin WHERE (EXCO_MND_ID = :EXCO_MND_ID)

SELECT UM_USER_ID, FPASS_USER_ID, UM_USERAPPLID, UM_USERSURNAME, UM_FIRSTNAME, USER_TEL, BOTHNAMESTEL, FPASS_DEPT_ID, DEPT_DEPARTMENT, FPASS_UDOM_ID, FPASS_UDOM_NAME, RO_ID, RO_NAME, RO_DESCRIPTION, USER_PLANTMASTER_YN FROM vw_fpass_userbyrole WHERE (MND_ID = :MND_ID) AND (UPPER(UM_USERSURNAME) LIKE :UM_USERSURNAME) AND (UPPER (UM_FIRSTNAME) LIKE :UM_FIRSTNAME) AND (UPPER(UM_USERAPPLID) LIKE :UM_USERAPPLID) AND (FPASS_USER_DELETE_YN = 'N')
SELECT DISTINCT USPL_PL_ID, PL_NAME, USPL_USER_ID FROM VW_FPASS_PLANTUSER WHERE (USPL_USER_ID = :USPL_USER_ID) AND (PL_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR PL_STATUS IS NULL)

INSERT INTO UM_USER (US_ID, US_NAME, US_FIRSTNAME, US_PASSWORD, US_FIRSTLOGIN, US_USERID, US_DELETED, US_CHANGEUSER, US_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (:US_ID, :US_NAME, :US_FIRSTNAME, :US_PASSWORD, :US_FIRSTLOGIN, :US_USERID, :US_DELETED, :US_CHANGEUSER, sysdate)

INSERT INTO FPASS_USER (USER_ID, USER_US_ID, USER_DEPT_ID, USER_UDOM_ID, USER_TEL, USER_PLANTMASTER_YN, USER_DELETE_YN, USER_NAME, USER_CHANGEUSER, USER_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (:USER_ID, :USER_US_ID, :USER_DEPT_ID, :USER_UDOM_ID, :USER_TEL, :USER_PLANTMASTER_YN, :USER_DELETE_YN, :USER_NAME, :USER_CHANGEUSER, sysdate)
INSERT INTO FPASS_USERMAN (USM_MND_ID, USM_USER_ID, USM_CHANGEUSER, USM_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (:USM_MND_ID, :USM_USER_ID, :USM_CHANGEUSER, :USM_TIMESTAMP)

INSERT INTO FPASS_USERPARAMETER (UPAR_ID, UPAR_ENTRANCEFLOWTIME, UPAR_NAUMBEROFPASS, UPAR_PRINTPREVIEW_YN, UPAR_CHANGEUSER, UPAR_TIMESTAMP, UPAR_USER_ID, UPAR_MND_ID) VALUES (:UPAR_ID, :UPAR_ENTRANCEFLOWTIME, :UPAR_NAUMBEROFPASS, :UPAR_PRINTPREVIEW_YN, :UPAR_CHANGEUSER, :UPAR_TIMESTAMP, :UPAR_USER_ID, :UPAR_MND_ID)
INSERT INTO FPASS_USERPLANT (USPL_ID, USPL_PL_ID, USPL_USER_ID, USPL_CHANGEUSER, USPL_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (:USPL_ID, :USPL_PL_ID, :USPL_USER_ID, :USPL_CHANGEUSER, :USPL_TIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO UM_ROLELINK (RL_ROLEID, RL_AUTHORIZEDENTITYID, RL_CHANGEUSER, RL_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (:RL_ROLEID, :RL_AUTHORIZEDENTITYID, :RL_CHANGEUSER, :RL_TIMESTAMP)
DELETE FPASS_USERPLANT WHERE (USPL_USER_ID = :USPL_USER_ID)

UPDATE UM_USER SET US_NAME = :US_NAME, US_FIRSTNAME = :US_FIRSTNAME, US_USERID = :US_USERID, US_DELETED = :US_DELETED, US_CHANGEUSER = :US_CHANGEUSER, US_TIMESTAMP = :US_TIMESTAMP WHERE ( US_ID = :US_ID)

UPDATE FPASS_USER SET USER_DEPT_ID = :USER_DEPT_ID, USER_UDOM_ID = :USER_UDOM_ID, USER_TEL = :USER_TEL, USER_PLANTMASTER_YN = :USER_PLANTMASTER_YN, USER_DELETE_YN = :USER_DELETE_YN, USER_NAME = :USER_NAME, USER_CHANGEUSER = :USER_CHANGEUSER, USER_TIMESTAMP = :USER_TIMESTAMP WHERE (USER_ID = :USER_ID) AND (USER_US_ID = :USER_US_ID)

UPDATE FPASS_USER SET USER_IDCARDREADER_HITAG = :USER_IDCARDREADER_HITAG, USER_IDCARDREADER_MIFARE = :USER_IDCARDREADER_MIFARE, USER_CHANGEUSER = :USER_CHANGEUSER, USER_TIMESTAMP = :USER_TIMESTAMP WHERE (USER_ID = :USER_ID)
UPDATE FPASS_COWORKER SET CWR_VALIDUNTIL = :CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_CHANGEUSER = :CWR_CHANGEUSER, CWR_TIMESTAMP = SYSDATE WHERE CWR_ID = :CWR_ID
SELECT RL_ROLEID, UM_ROLE_NAME, UM_ROLEFORMAT, RL_AUTHORIZEDENTITYID, RL_CHANGEUSER, RL_TIMESTAMP FROM VW_FPASS_ROLEBYUSER WHERE (RL_AUTHORIZEDENTITYID = :RL_AUTHORIZEDENTITYID)
SELECT ECEC_ECOD_ID, UM_BOTHNAMESTEL, EXCO_NAME FROM vw_fpass_exco_coord_admin WHERE (ECEC_EXCO_ID = :ECEC_EXCO_ID )
SELECT ECOD_ID FROM fpass_excocoordinator WHERE (ECOD_USER_ID = :ECOD_USER_ID )
SELECT DISTINCT CWR_EXCO_ID FROM fpass_coworker WHERE ( CWR_ECOD_ID = :CWR_ECOD_ID )
SELECT COUNT(cwr_id) AS result FROM fpass_coworker WHERE (CWR_EXCO_ID = :CWR_EXCO_ID) AND (CWR_ECOD_ID = :CWR_ECOD_ID)
SELECT EXCO_ID FROM FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR WHERE (EXCO_NAME = :EXCO_NAME) AND (EXCO_MND_ID = :EXCO_MND_ID)
SELECT * FROM DUAL
SELECT * FROM DUAL
select count(*) from fpass_excoecod where ecec_ecod_id = :ecec_ecod_id and ecec_exco_id = :ecec_exco_id
select distinct ECEC_ECOD_ID, UM_BOTHNAMES, UM_BOTHNAMESTEL from vw_fpass_exco_coord_admin
Select distinct ECEC_EXCO_ID, EXCO_NAME from vw_fpass_exco_coord_admin
select distinct ECEC_ECOD_ID, UM_BOTHNAMES, UM_BOTHNAMESTEL from vw_fpass_exco_coord_admin where EXCO_MND_ID = :EXCO_MND_ID order by UM_BOTHNAMESTEL
select VWC_ID, VWC_BOTHNAMES from VW_FPASS_COORDINATORS where VWC_MND_ID = :VWC_MND_ID
select AVWC_ID, AVWC_BOTHNAMES from VW_FPASS_ARCOORDINATORS where AVWC_MND_ID = :AVWC_MND_ID
SELECT EXCO_SUPERSURNAME ||' '|| EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME ||' ('|| EXCO_NAME ||')' AS SUPERVISOR, EXCO_ID FROM FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR WHERE (EXCO_MND_ID = :EXCO_MND_ID AND EXCO_SUPERSURNAME IS NOT NULL)
SELECT AECO_SUPERSURNAME ||' '|| AECO_SUPERFIRSTNAME ||' ('|| AECO_NAME ||')' AS SUPERVISOR, AECO_ID FROM FPASS_AREXCONTRACTOR WHERE (AECO_AMND_ID = :AECO_AMND_ID AND AECO_SUPERSURNAME IS NOT NULL)
SELECT EXCO_ID, EXCO_NAME FROM FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR where EXCO_MND_ID = :EXCO_MND_ID AND (EXCO_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR EXCO_STATUS IS NULL) order by EXCO_NAME
SELECT EXCO_NAME FROM VW_FPASS_NONFPASS_EXCO
SELECT EXCO_ID, EXCO_NAME FROM FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR where EXCO_MND_ID = :EXCO_MND_ID AND (EXCO_STATUS = 'UNGÜLTIG') order by EXCO_NAME
SELECT AECO_ID, AECO_NAME from FPASS_AREXCONTRACTOR where AECO_AMND_ID = :AECO_AMND_ID order by AECO_NAME
select ECEC_ECOD_ID, ECEC_EXCO_ID from FPASS_EXCOECOD
select CRA_ID, CRA_CRAFTNO, CRA_CRAFTNOTATION from FPASS_CRAFT WHERE (CRA_MND_ID = :CRA_MND_ID) order by CRA_CRAFTNO

SqlCommand.SQL: select PL_ID, PL_NAME from FPASS_PLANT WHERE PL_MND_ID = :PL_MND_ID AND PL_SOURCE = 'FPASS' AND (PL_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR PL_STATUS IS NULL) order by PL_NAME

SqlCommand.Sql: select CWR_ID, CWR_TK, CWR_PERSNO, CWR_MND_ID, CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_MIFARENO, CWR_WINDOWS_ID, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_DATEOFBIRTH, CWR_PLACEOFBIRTH, CWR_DATECREATED, CWR_VALIDFROM, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, EXCO1.EXCO_NAME as EXCONTRACTOR, EXCO2.EXCO_NAME as SUBEXCONTRACTOR, EXCO1.EXCO_SUPERSURNAME || ', ' || EXCO1.EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME as SUPERVISOR, DEPT_DEPARTMENT, USER_NAME from FPASS_COWORKER, FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR EXCO1, FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR EXCO2, FPASS_DEPARTMENT, FPASS_EXCOCOORDINATOR, FPASS_USER where CWR_ID = :CWR_ID AND EXCO1.EXCO_ID(+) = CWR_EXCO_ID AND EXCO2.EXCO_ID(+) = CWR_SUBE_ID AND DEPT_ID(+) = CWR_DEPT_ID AND ECOD_ID(+) = CWR_ECOD_ID AND USER_ID = ECOD_USER_ID
SELECT PARZ_KEY, PARZ_VALUE FROM FPASS_PARAMETERZKS WHERE PARZ_MND_ID = :PARZ_MND_ID
SELECT CWBR_BRF_ID, CWBR_BRIEFING_YN, CWBR_INACTIVE_YN, CWBR_BRIEFINGDATE FROM FPASS_CWRBRIEFING WHERE (CWBR_BRF_ID = 48 OR CWBR_BRF_ID = 49) AND CWBR_CWR_ID = :CWBR_CWR_ID

SELECT r2.RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN as RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN, r6.RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN as RATH_RECEPTAUTHO_YN6, r6.RATH_RECEPTAUTHODATE as RATH_RECEPTAUTHODATE6 FROM FPASS_RECEPTIONAUTHORIZE r2, FPASS_RECEPTIONAUTHORIZE r6 WHERE r2.RATH_CWR_ID = r6.RATH_CWR_ID (+) AND (r2.RATH_RATT_ID = 2 OR r2.RATH_RATT_ID = 5) AND r6.RATH_RATT_ID (+) = 6 AND r2.RATH_CWR_ID = :RATH_CWR_ID

SELECT CWR_ID, CWR_MND_ID, CWR_WINDOWS_ID, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_MIFARENO, CWR_STATUS, EXCO_NAME, CWR_VALIDUNTIL, CWR_PKI, VWC_ID, VWC_BOTHNAMESTEL FROM VW_FPASS_COWORKER_SMARTACT WHERE CWR_MND_ID = :CWR_MND_ID
SELECT TER_HOSTNAME, TER_PORTNO, TER_USERNAME, TER_PASSWORD, TER_TERMINALNO, TER_LASTIDCARDNO FROM FPASS_TERMINAL WHERE UPPER(TER_COMPUTERNAME) = :TER_COMPUTERNAME
SELECT CWR_IDCARDNO, CWR_MIFARENO FROM FPASS_COWORKER WHERE CWR_ID != :CWR_ID AND CWR_MND_ID = :CWR_MND_ID AND (CWR_IDCARDNO = :CWR_IDCARDNO OR CWR_MIFARENO = :CWR_MIFARENO)
SELECT CWR_ID FROM FPASS_COWORKER WHERE CWR_EXCO_ID = :CWR_EXCO_ID AND UPPER(CWR_SURNAME) = :CWR_SURNAME AND CWR_MND_ID = :CWR_MND_ID

SELECT VH1_CWRBOTHNAMES, VH1_COORD, VH1_RESPDATEFROM, VH1_RESPDATEUNTIL, VH1_CHANGEDATE, VH1_USERNICENAME FROM VW_FPASS_COWORKER_COORD_HIST WHERE VH1_CWR_ID = :VH1_CWR_ID ORDER BY VH1_CWR_ID, VH1_RESPDATEUNTIL DESC, VH1_RESPDATEFROM DESC

SELECT VH2_EXCO_ID, VH2_EXCO_NAME, VH2_COORD_ID, VH2_BOTHNAMESTEL, VH2_RESPDATEFROM, VH2_CREATEDBY, VH2_RESPDATEUNTIL, VH2_DELETEDBY FROM VW_FPASS_EXCO_ECOD_HIST WHERE VH2_EXCO_ID = :VH2_EXCO_ID ORDER BY VH2_RESPDATEUNTIL DESC, VH2_RESPDATEFROM DESC

SELECT PL_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(CWPL_VALIDUNTIL,'dd.mm.yyyy') CWPL_VALIDUNTIL FROM FPASS_CWRPLANT JOIN FPASS_PLANT ON (PL_ID = CWPL_PL_ID) WHERE PL_SOURCE = 'ZKS' AND CWPL_INACTIVE_YN = 'N' AND CWPL_CWR_ID = :CWPL_CWR_ID ORDER BY PL_NUMBER

SELECT pmed.PMED_CWR_ID, pmty.PMTY_TYPE, pmty.PMTY_NOTATION, pmed.PMED_VALIDUNTIL FROM FPASS_PRECAUTIONMED pmed JOIN FPASS_PRECMEDTYPE pmty ON pmed.PMED_PMTY_ID = pmty.PMTY_ID WHERE pmed.PMED_CWR_ID = :PMED_CWR_ID ORDER BY pmed.PMED_VALIDUNTIL

ListOfValue.SQL: SELECT CWR_ID, CWR_FIRSTNAME, CWR_SURNAME, CWR_ORDERNO from FPASS_COWORKER where cwr_exco_id in (select exco_id from fpass_excontractor where exco_mnd_id = $RESTRICTION ) ORDER BY NLSSORT(CWR_FIRSTNAME, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')

SELECT EXCO_SUPERSURNAME||', '||EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME as SUPERVISOR, EXCO_ID, EXCO_NAME, EXCO_SUPERSURNAME, EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME, EXCO_CITY from FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR WHERE (EXCO_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION) AND (EXCO_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR EXCO_STATUS IS NULL) ORDER BY NLSSORT(EXCO_NAME, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')

SELECT DISTINCT EXCO_CITY from FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR WHERE (EXCO_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION) AND (EXCO_CITY IS NOT NULL) AND (EXCO_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR EXCO_STATUS IS NULL) ORDER BY NLSSORT (EXCO_CITY, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')

SELECT DISTINCT EXCO_SUPERSURNAME ||' '|| EXCO_SUPERFIRSTNAME ||' ('|| EXCO_NAME ||')' AS SUPERVISOR, EXCO_ID FROM FPASS_EXCONTRACTOR WHERE (EXCO_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION) AND (EXCO_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR EXCO_STATUS IS NULL) AND EXCO_SUPERSURNAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NLSSORT (SUPERVISOR, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT DISTINCT VWC_ID, VWC_BOTHNAMES, VWC_BOTHNAMESTEL FROM VW_FPASS_COORDINATORS WHERE VWC_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION ORDER BY NLSSORT (VWC_BOTHNAMES, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_DEPARTMENT FROM FPASS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION AND (DEPT_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR DEPT_STATUS IS NULL) ORDER BY NLSSORT (DEPT_DEPARTMENT, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')

ListsOfValue.ListOfValue:
FPASS_CRAFT SELECT CRA_ID, CRA_CRAFTNO, CRA_CRAFTNOTATION FROM FPASS_CRAFT WHERE CRA_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION ORDER BY NLSSORT (CRA_CRAFTNO, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
L

ListOfValue.SQL: SELECT PL_ID, PL_NAME FROM FPASS_PLANT WHERE PL_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION AND (PL_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR PL_STATUS IS NULL) ORDER BY NLSSORT (PL_NAME, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT PL_ID, PL_NAME FROM FPASS_PLANT WHERE PL_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION AND PL_SOURCE = 'FPASS' AND (PL_STATUS = 'GÜLTIG' OR PL_STATUS IS NULL) ORDER BY NLSSORT (PL_NAME, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT PMTY_TYPE || ', ' || PMTY_NOTATION AS PMTY_FULLNAME, PMTY_ID, PMTY_TYPE, PMTY_NOTATION FROM FPASS_PRECMEDTYPE WHERE PMTY_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION ORDER BY NLSSORT (PMTY_TYPE, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT DISTINCT PMTY_TYPE FROM FPASS_PRECMEDTYPE WHERE PMTY_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION ORDER BY NLSSORT (PMTY_TYPE, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT PMTY_ID, PMTY_NOTATION FROM FPASS_PRECMEDTYPE WHERE PMTY_MND_ID = $RESTRICTION ORDER BY NLSSORT (PMTY_NOTATION, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT UDOM_ID, UDOM_NAME FROM FPASS_USERDOMAINE ORDER BY NLSSORT (UDOM_NAME, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT RL_ROLEID, UM_ROLEFORMAT FROM VW_FPASS_ROLEBYMANDATOR WHERE MND_ID = $RESTRICTION ORDER BY NLSSORT (UM_ROLEFORMAT, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
SELECT UM_USER_ID, BOTHNAMESTEL, UM_USERSURNAME FROM vw_fpass_user_summary WHERE MND_ID = $RESTRICTION ORDER BY NLSSORT (UM_USERSURNAME, 'NLS_SORT=GERMAN')
